body:
AS I'M SURE EVERY FIRE EMBLEM FAN KNOWS, SHADOWS OF VALENTIA RELEASES TOMORROW. EXTREME _**HYYYYYYPE. **_

Therefore, I figured I'd make a megathread for the game, to discuss just about anything about the game. 
The music, difficulty, characters, mechanics, neat things most people wouldn't notice, faithfulness to the original, sharing fan art or official art, (un)amazing encounters with RNGesus crits and the like, etc.
#IF YOU'RE GOING TO TALK ABOUT THE GAME'S STORY, MAKE SURE THERE'S AN EXTREMELY NOTICEABLE SPOILER WARNING. WE'RE NOT TRYING TO RUIN ANYONE'S EXPERIENCE IN THIS THREAD, BE CONSIDERATE.

LET YOUR HYPE OVERFLOW IN THIS THREAD, FIRE EMBLEM FANS. I KNOW I WILL. TIME TO EXPERIENCE ALM AND CELICA'S STORY.
